sentences: Fred John Philip Gibson, (born 19 July 1993) known professionally as Fred Again (stylised as Fred again..) or simply Fred (stylised as FRED), is a British singer, songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, record producer and remixer.

Gibson's career began after he joined an a cappella group at Brian Eno's studio in London; there, he managed to impress Eno with his skill in using Logic Pro, leading to Gibson gaining the revered musician as a mentor.
